short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Note well. WYSIWYG note-taking just a tab away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nota Bene is an extension designed to enhance your browsing experience and enhance productivity by allowing you to take notes in-browser. Jot down ideas, tasks, and use markdown-style shortcuts with a what-you-see-is-what-you-get experience to organize your notes and keep your flow in motion. Rest assured, all your notes are saved between sessions so you can access them at any time.
